channel.title: Client #484
channel.description:
Could you guys be so kind as to post your updater outputs...again. Seems like Deja Vu' :p
Speedster239....

item.title: Client #484
item.dc:creator: @speedster239 speedster239
item.description:
@speedster239 wrote:

I hereby join this race with my first three bcel hooks ever, I’m certain all of them will break in the update but at least it’s a start 

Runescape Build #484
minimapInt1() Found -> ef.static int c
minimapInt2() Found -> h.static int l
Canvas() Found -> pe
minimapInt3() Found -> pe.static int j
myPlayer() Found -> r.static u X

item.title: Client #484
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Cheese_Police:

It updated twice in 24 hours…?

They’re making up for all the times they didn’t update during winter vacation ;). Also, my stream read analysis broke rather badly.

Read full topic

item.title: Client #484
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:

[quote=“speedster239, post:1, topic:173839”]Could you guys be so kind as to post your updater outputs…again. Seems like Deja Vu’

It updated twice in 24 hours…?
